name: WaterWorldSmartHome
0:
”Alexa, turn on home lights”
”Alexa, turn off home lights”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Connect your WaterWorld light to Alexa
1.Download the WtwdSmart app
2.Set up your WaterWorld light following the WtwdSmart app instructions
3.Return to the Alexa app
4.Press Continue to go to the skill store to enable the WaterWorld Smart Home skill
